TextView.android:text: MERCURYY- The First Planet from the Sun

Basic Information:
Type: Terrestrial planet
Order from Sun: 1st planet
Distance from Sun: ~57.91 million km (~0.39 AU)
Diameter: 4,879 km (smallest planet in the Solar System)
Mass: ~3.301 × 10²³ kg (about 5.5% of Earth's mass)
Gravity: 3.7 m/s² (about 38% of Earth's gravity)

Orbital And Rotational Characteristics:
Revolution period (around Sun): 87.97 Earth days
Rotation period (on its own axis): 58.65 Earth days
Orbital Speed: 47.87 km/s (fastest planet in the Solar System)
Axial Tilt: ~0.034° (almost no tilt, so no significant seasons)
Orbital Eccentricity: 0.2056 (most elliptical orbit among planets)

Moons And Rings:
Number of Moons: 0 (Mercury has no natural satellites)
Number of Rings: 0

Surface And Atmosphere:
Surface Temperature:
Day: Up to 430°C (800°F)
Night: Down to -180°C (-290°F)
Surface Composition: Rocky, covered with craters (similar to the Moon)
Atmosphere Type: Extremely thin (exosphere)
Main Gases in Atmosphere: Oxygen (O₂), Sodium (Na), Hydrogen (H₂), Helium (He), Potassium (K)
Weather Conditions: No stable atmosphere, extreme temperature variations
